plot: While at the beach, Ben discovers a new alien hero with the power to duplicate itself. Ben must use this new form to defeat Dr. Animo and his army of mutated stinkflies.

While creating havoc at the beach for fun, Ben discovers Ditto, a new alien within his Omnitrix entourage. Ditto can replicate himself many times over but with two drawbacks. First, injury to one will be felt by all. Second, Ben can't become Ben again unless all the Dittos are together. This sort of comes in handy when Dr. Animo, freshly escaped from prison, arrives with a giant seagull mutation to capture Ben and add his alien gene pools to Animo's transmutation matrix.—statmanjeff
